title: Loris Rouiller wins exciting three-up sprint at Virginia’s Blue Ridge Go Cross while Maghalie Rochette cruises to victory
content:
The first race of the USCX Series produced a tight battle in the men’s race while Maghalie Rochette finished nearly a minute up on her closest rival. 

Read the full article at Loris Rouiller wins exciting three-up sprint at Virginia’s Blue Ridge Go Cross while Maghalie Rochette cruises to victory on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
